sentences.english: This article mainly introduces an improved system of mate-grinding servo valve.

sentences.english: In this paper, we analyze the force-fighting mechanism of quad redundant servo system.
sentences.chinese: 对四余度伺服系统的力纷争现象进行了机理分析。

sentences.english: The server part of the channel is located at the start of the server context sink chain.

sentences.english: So, the ability of antipollution becomes the important performance of electrohydraulic servo valve.
sentences.chinese: 因此，抗污染能力成为电液伺服阀的重要指标。

sentences.english: The method has been applied in mechanical scanning antenna servo system.

sentences.english: Friction is an important factor influencing positioning precision of the AC servo XY worktable.

sentences.english: Blade volume is about 1/10th that of rack-mount servers.

sentences.english: Ac servo system in many performance is better than the stepping motor.
sentences.chinese: 交流伺服系统在许多性能方面都优于步进电机。

sentences.english: A kind of servo control system which uses in unmanned platform has been designed and developed in this paper.
